quotes: An honest public servant can't become rich in politics. He can only attain greatness and satisfaction by service.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: My choice early in life was either to be a piano player in a whorehouse or a politician. To tell the truth, there's hardly a difference.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: Work Hard. Do your best. Keep your word. Never get too big for your britches. Trust in God. Have no fear; and Never forget a friend.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: Imperfect action beats perfect inaction every time.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: Term limits would cure both senility and seniority- both terrible legislative diseases.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: When even one American - who has done nothing wrong - is forced by fear to shut his mind and close his mouth - then all Americans are in peril.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: The only thing new in the world is the history you don't know.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: America was not built on fear. America was built on courage, on imagination and an unbeatable determination to do the job at hand.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: Never kick a fresh turd on a hot day.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: If you can't convince them, confuse them.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: It doesn't matter how big a ranch you own or how many cows you brand, the size of your funeral is still gonna depend on the weather.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: If you don't have your own goals, you'll be doomed to work toward someone else's.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: A leader is the man who has the ability to get other people to do what they don't want to do, and like it.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: I never did give anybody hell. I just told the truth and they thought it was hell.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: If you want a friend in Washington, buy a dog.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: There is some risk involved in action, there always is. But there is far more risk in failure to act.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: The buck stops here!
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: Once a decision was made, I didn’t worry about it afterward.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: It’s a recession when your neighbor loses his job; it’s a depression when you lose your own.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: The Republicans believe in the minimum wage — the more the minimum, the better.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: Suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a Republican. But I repeat myself.
author: Harry S. Truman

quotes: Whenever you have an efficient government you have a dictatorship.
author: Harry S. Truman
